verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> upon Nehiloth, <WH5155> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> Give ear <WH238> to my words, <WH561> O LORD, <WH3068> consider <WH995> my meditation. <WH1901>
Listen <WH7181> to the voice <WH6963> of my cry, <WH7773> my King, <WH4428> and my God: <WH430> for to you will I pray. <WH6419>
My voice <WH6963> shall you hear <WH8085> in the morning, <WH1242> O LORD; <WH3068> in the morning <WH1242> will I direct <WH6186> my prayer to you, and will look <WH6822> up.
For you are not a God <WH410> that has pleasure <WH2655> in wickedness: <WH7562> neither <WH3808> shall evil <WH7451> dwell <WH1481> with you.
The foolish <WH1984> shall not stand <WH3320> in your sight: <WH5869> you hate <WH8130> all <WH3605> workers <WH6466> of iniquity. <WH205>
You shall destroy <WH6> them that speak <WH1696> leasing: <WH3577> the LORD <WH3068> will abhor <WH8581> the bloody <WH1818> and deceitful <WH4820> man. <WH376>

But as for me, I will come <WH935> into your house <WH1004> in the multitude <WH7230> of your mercy: <WH2617> and in your fear <WH3374> will I worship <WH7812> toward <WH413> your holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>
Lead <WH5148> me, O LORD, <WH3068> in your righteousness <WH6666> because <WH4616> of my enemies; <WH8324> make your way <WH1870> straight <WH3474> before my face. <WH6440>

For there is no <WH369> faithfulness <WH3559> in their mouth; <WH6310> their inward <WH7130> part is very <WH1942> wickedness; <WH1942> their throat <WH1627> is an open <WH6605> sepulcher; <WH6913> they flatter <WH2505> with their tongue. <WH3956>

Destroy <WH816> you them, O God; <WH430> let them fall <WH5307> by their own counsels; <WH4156> cast <WH5080> them out in the multitude <WH7230> of their transgressions; <WH6588> for they have rebelled <WH4784> against you.

But let all <WH3605> those that put their trust <WH2620> in you rejoice: <WH8055> let them ever <WH5769> shout <WH7442> for joy, because you defend <WH5526> them: let them also that love <WH157> your name <WH8034> be joyful <WH5970> in you.
For you, LORD, <WH3068> will bless <WH1288> the righteous; <WH6662> with favor <WH7522> will you compass <WH5849> him as with a shield. <WH6793>
